title: Using python, LXC and linux to create a mass VM hosting, managed by django and angularjs
summary:
How we created a scalable mass VM hosting for open source web apps with
python, LXC and linux with a web-UI based on django and angularjs. We'll
show the underlying architecture of this service, several linux
internals that make this possible and we'll talk about bitter failure
during development. This talk will be python- and linux-centric with
some hints for integrating angularjs into django.
